caption:
This vinaigrette opens up the savory potential of the humble apple. Bright, tangy notes are balanced by the apple’s natural sweetness, perfect for cutting through the char of a roasted vegetable salad 🍏Get the recipe below ⬇️ and to make the most out of your apple harvest, head to the link in our bio for more recipes! 

// INGREDIENTS //
2 apples, cored 
½ shallot
1 garlic clove, minced
½ c apple cider vinegar
2 tbsp honey
1 tbsp dijon mustard
1 tbsp soy sauce 
1 tbsp water
1 tbsp kosher salt
1 c extra virgin olive oil 

// INSTRUCTIONS // 
Add all the ingredients for the vinaigrette into a blender and blend until smooth and creamy. Set aside for serving.
